about_the_game:
Whether you're smashing through enemy rockets or mastering gravity-defying maneuvers, the music of "Rocket Smash" will keep you groovin'! The Rocket Smash soundtrack consists of 9 unique upbeat and energetic tracks that perfectly complements the Rocket Smash action!

Comes with both MP3 and WAV formats for every song.

WARNING: LISTENING TO THIS MUSIC MAY MAKE YOU WANT TO SMASH SOMETHING!!!
detailed_description:
Join our Discord


About the Game

Whether you're smashing through enemy rockets or mastering gravity-defying maneuvers, the music of "Rocket Smash" will keep you groovin'! The Rocket Smash soundtrack consists of 9 unique upbeat and energetic tracks that perfectly complements the Rocket Smash action!

Comes with both MP3 and WAV formats for every song.

WARNING: LISTENING TO THIS MUSIC MAY MAKE YOU WANT TO SMASH SOMETHING!!!
name: Rocket Smash Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 300 MB available space
